item.title: OpenAI首席执行官阿尔特曼在明尼苏达州枪击案后告诉员工："移民与海关执法局（ICE）的行动已越界"
item.description: OpenAI首席执行官山姆·奥尔特曼在内部消息中告诉员工，美国移民与海关执法局（ICE）的移民打击行动"走得太远"，成为最新一位对明尼苏达州严厉执法行动表示担忧的企业高管。【原文：OpenAI CEO Sam Altman told employees in an internal message that ICE is "going too far" with its immigration crackdown, becoming the latest corporate executive to voice concerns about heavy enforcement actions in Minnesota.】

item.title: 金价持续飙升突破5200美元关口，美元暴跌至四年低点
item.description: 周三，金价首次突破5200美元大关，此前周二已上涨逾3%。随着持续的地缘政治担忧发酵，美元兑美元汇率跌至近四年低点，而美联储货币政策决议即将公布。【原文：Gold broke through $5,200 for the first ​time on Wednesday, after rising more than 3% on Tuesday, as the dollar ‌plunged to a near four-year low amid persisting geopolitical concerns, ahead of a U.S. Federal Reserve monetary policy decision.】

item.title: 据《信息报》报道，C3.AI正与初创企业Automation Anywhere洽谈合并事宜。
item.description: 企业人工智能软件供应商C3.AI正与私营初创企业Automation Anywhere洽谈合并事宜，科技媒体The Information周二援引知情人士消息报道称。【原文：Enterprise artificial intelligence software provider C3.AI is in talks to merge with privately held startup Automation Anywhere, The Information reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 2025年澳大利亚葡萄酒出口量萎缩，饮酒者逐渐清醒
item.description: 澳大利亚葡萄酒出口额在2025年下降8%，至23.4亿澳元（16亿美元），行业机构周三表示，全球饮酒量下降导致对包括中国和英国在内的主要市场的出货量减少。【原文：The value of Australia's wine exports fell by 8% to A$2.34 billion ($1.6 billion) in 2025 as a global decline in drinking led to lower shipments to key markets including China and Britain, an industry body said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普言论后美元暴跌；欧元、日元、英镑强势上涨
item.description: 周三，美元汇率在四年低点附近挣扎，陷入"信心危机"。此前美国总统特朗普对美元近期疲软不以为意，加剧了美元抛售潮，推升了日元、欧元和英镑汇率。【原文：The U.S. dollar was grappling with a "crisis of confidence" as it struggled near four-year lows on Wednesday after President Donald Trump brushed off its recent weakness, exacerbating the dollar selling and lifting the yen, euro and sterling.】

item.title: 油价涨跌不一，因冬季风暴后美国供应担忧持续
item.description: 周三油价涨跌不一，布伦特原油小幅下跌，而美国合约小幅上涨，因周末一场冬季风暴扰乱原油产量并中断墨西哥湾沿岸出口后，市场对供应的担忧加剧。【原文：Oil prices were mixed on Wednesday, with Brent down slightly but the U.S. contract edging higher as supply concerns grew after a winter storm disrupted crude output and halted Gulf Coast exports over the weekend.】

item.title: 台湾与美国在高级别论坛上讨论科技、人工智能及无人机合作事宜
item.description: 台湾与美国高级官员在特朗普政府首任期启动的高层论坛上，就人工智能、科技及无人机领域的合作展开讨论。美国国务院盛赞台北是"重要合作伙伴"。【原文：Senior Taiwanese and U.S. officials discussed cooperation in artificial intelligence, tech and drones at a high-level forum begun during the first Trump administration, with the U.S. State Department praising Taipei as a "vital partner."】

item.title: 《The Information》报道称，Anthropic将2026年营收预期上调20%
item.description: 人工智能初创公司Anthropic上调了未来几年的营收预期，预计今年销售额将翻四倍至180亿美元，明年达到550亿美元，《The Information》周二报道称。【原文：Artificial intelligence startup Anthropic has raised its revenue forecasts for the next several years, projecting sales to quadruple this year to as much as $18 billion and reach $55 billion next year, The Information reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 亚马逊因内部邮件失误搞砸周三裁员计划
item.description: 亚马逊周二似乎误发通知，提前数小时向众多亚马逊云服务（AWS）员工发送了慰问邮件及全团队会议邀请，告知周三上午将实施裁员计划。【原文：Amazon on Tuesday appeared to have mistakenly alerted many Amazon Web Services cloud computing employees about layoffs planned for Wednesday morning with a commiseration email and team-wide meeting invite sent hours early.】

item.title: 金价突破5200美元创历史新高
item.description: 周三金价飙升至每盎司5200美元以上，创下历史新高，延续了这场历史性涨势。经济与地缘政治的不确定性推动了对这种避险黄金的需求。【原文：Gold surged ​above $5,200 ‌an ounce on ‌Wednesday to a ​record high, ‍extending a historic rally ⁠as ‍economic and ‌geopolitical ‌uncertainty drove demand for ⁠the ⁠safe-haven ​yellow metal.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁加征关税后称"我们将与韩国达成某种协议"
item.description: 当被问及周一突然宣布将对韩国进口商品加征关税至25%一事时，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普周二表示，美韩两国将共同寻求解决方案。【原文：President Donald Trump on Tuesday said the United States and South Korea will work out ‌a solution when asked about his surprise Monday announcement that he would increase tariffs on imports from the Asian country to 25%.】

item.title: 知情人士称软银正洽谈向OpenAI追加最高300亿美元投资
item.description: 知情人士周二向路透社透露，软银正就向OpenAI追加投资最多300亿美元进行磋商。【原文：SoftBank is in discussions ​to invest up to an ‌additional $30 billion in OpenAI, a person familiar with the matter told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: ADM支付4000万美元与美国证交会达成和解，免于刑事指控
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会周二宣布，谷物贸易商阿彻丹尼尔斯米德兰公司及其两名前高管因虚报关键业务部门业绩，将被处以4000万美元民事罚款。【原文：Grain trader Archer-Daniels-Midland Company will pay a $40 million civil penalty after the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission charged it and two of its former executives with inflating the performance of a key business segment, the regulator said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普引发美元抛售潮
item.description: 周三美元汇率岌岌可危，逼近多年低点。此前当美国总统特朗普似乎对美元近期下跌不以为意时，投资者猛烈抛售美元，而华尔街股市则持续攀升至历史新高。【原文：The dollar was on the ropes near multi-year ​lows on Wednesday after investors sold it aggressively when U.S. President Donald Trump seemed to ‌shrug off its recent decline, while Wall Street marched on to fresh record highs.】

item.title: 甲骨文公司表示，数据中心故障导致美国TikTok用户遭遇问题
item.description: 甲骨文公司周二表示，美国用户在使用社交媒体应用TikTok时遇到的问题，是由于甲骨文数据中心发生临时性天气相关停电所致。【原文：Oracle said on Tuesday that issues faced by U.S. users of social media app TikTok are the result of a temporary weather-related power outage at an Oracle data center.】

item.title: 达美航空订购31架空客客机，推进远程机队升级计划
item.description: 达美航空周二宣布将采购31架空客宽体客机，作为其现代化国际机队并支持未来增长的长期计划的一部分。该公司正着力满足企业客户及高收入旅客的需求。【原文：Delta Air Lines said on Tuesday it would purchase 31 Airbus widebody jets as part of a long-term plan to modernize its international fleet and support future growth as it focuses on demand from corporate and high-income travelers.】

item.title: 矿业巨头墨西哥集团第四季度净利润翻倍，得益于金属价格上涨
item.description: 墨西哥集团周二表示，受金属价格上涨和销量增长推动，这家全球最大铜生产商之一的第四季度净利润几乎翻倍，这完全抵消了因石油平台停运和汇率不利因素导致的基础设施业务疲软。【原文：Grupo Mexico , one of the world's largest copper producers, nearly doubled its fourth-quarter net profit on higher metals prices and stronger volumes, it said on Tuesday, more than offsetting weaker infrastructure results tied to suspended oil platforms and foreign-exchange headwinds.】

item.title: 美元跌至四年低点，特朗普对此不以为意
item.description: 周二，美元兑一篮子货币延续跌势，跌至四年低点。【原文：The U.S. dollar extended losses to sink to a four-year low against a basket of currencies on Tuesday.】

item.title: 花旗集团驳斥针对高管的骚扰指控，寻求将案件移交仲裁
item.description: 花旗集团周二强烈驳斥了前董事总经理的指控。该董事总经理以财富管理主管安迪·西格涉嫌性骚扰为由起诉该银行，花旗表示她曾对西格表达"坚定"支持，且此案应通过仲裁解决。【原文：Citigroup on Tuesday forcefully rejected accusations by a former managing director who sued the bank over alleged sexual harassment by wealth management chief Andy Sieg, saying she expressed "steadfast" support for him and that her case belongs in arbitration.】

item.title: 特朗普预测在宣布美联储主席人选后利率将下降
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普周二表示，他将很快宣布美联储主席人选，并预测新主席上任后利率将下降。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday said he will soon announce his pick to serve as head of the Federal Reserve, and predicted interest rates would decline after the new chair takes over.】

item.title: 特朗普指出拖拉机制造商迪尔公司在北卡罗来纳州投资7000万美元建设工厂
item.description: 美国总统特朗普周二在演讲中宣布，农业设备制造商约翰迪尔公司将在北卡罗来纳州投资7000万美元建设工厂。【原文：Farm-equipment maker Deere & Co ​is making a $70 ‌million factory investment in North Carolina, U.S. President ‌Donald Trump said in ​a speech on Tuesday.】

item.title: 雪佛龙任命资深高管托马斯·霍顿加入董事会
item.description: 雪佛龙公司周二宣布，已任命美国航空前董事长兼首席执行官托马斯·W·霍顿加入这家能源巨头的董事会，担任独立董事。【原文：Chevron said on Tuesday it has appointed former American Airlines Chairman and CEO Thomas W. Horton to the energy major's board as an independent director.】

item.title: PPG工业公司第四季度利润未达预期，预计2026年欧洲工业市场将持续疲软
item.description: 全球涂料供应商PPG工业公司周二表示，预计未来一年欧洲及全球工业终端市场需求将持续疲软。此前该公司第四季度利润未达华尔街预期。【原文：Global paint supplier PPG Industries said on Tuesday it expects demand in Europe and across global industrial end-use markets to remain soft ​in the coming year, after the company fell short of Wall ‌Street's fourth-quarter profit expectations.】

item.title: 交易日 极端分化
item.description: 全球股市与标普500指数周二创下新高，得益于美国企业财报普遍强劲。与此同时，市场对美国总统特朗普政策方向的担忧推升避险资产黄金价格至新高，美元汇率则跌至四年低点。【原文：World stocks and the S&P 500 hit new highs on Tuesday, boosted by a flood of strong U.S. earnings reports, while anxiety over U.S. President Donald Trump's policy direction sent safe-haven gold to fresh peaks and sank the dollar to a four-year low.】

item.title: 希捷预测季度业绩将超预期，因数据存储需求强劲
item.description: 希捷科技周二公布的第三季度营收和利润超出华尔街预期，得益于企业扩大人工智能应用规模所带来的数据存储设备强劲需求。【原文：Seagate Technology forecast third-quarter revenue and profit above Wall Street expectations on Tuesday, benefiting from strong demand for its data storage devices as enterprises scale up their use of artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 美国医保局公布礼来、辉瑞和艾伯维三家药企药品名单，将参与下一轮医保价格谈判
item.description: 美国联邦医疗保险和医疗补助服务中心周二公布了第三轮联邦医疗保险药品价格谈判计划的新一批品牌药名单，涵盖礼来、辉瑞和艾伯维等大型制药企业，其中包括首批纳入联邦医疗保险B部分报销范围的药品。【原文：The U.S. Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services on Tuesday named a new group of branded drugs from major pharmaceutical companies including Eli Lilly , Pfizer and AbbVie for the third cycle of the Medicare Drug Price Negotiation Program, including the first products reimbursed under Medicare Part B.】

item.title: 特朗普称美元价值"非常棒"
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普周二被问及是否认为美元贬值过多时表示，美元价值非常高。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump ​on Tuesday said the value of the ‌dollar is great when asked whether he thought it had declined too much.】

item.title: 据消息人士透露，私募股权公司奥达克斯集团正为BlueCat Networks寻求超过15亿美元的融资。
item.description: 据知情人士透露，私募股权公司奥达克斯集团正考虑出售网络安全服务商BlueCat Networks，该交易可能价值超过15亿美元。【原文：Private equity firm Audax Group is exploring a sale of cybersecurity provider BlueCat Networks, which could fetch more than $1.5 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司2025年订单积压量创纪录达316亿美元
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司周二发布的证券文件显示，截至第四季度末，其确认订单积压量达到创纪录的316亿美元，较上年同期增长20%。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer's firm order backlog stood at a record $31.6 billion at the end of the fourth quarter, up 20% from a year earlier, according to a securities filing published on Tuesday.】

item.title: 罗技公布疫情以来最佳季度利润
item.description: 罗技国际周二公布了疫情以来的最佳季度财报，这家电脑外设制造商受益于视频会议设备销量增长和教育支出增加。【原文：Logitech International reported its best quarterly earnings since the pandemic on Tuesday, as the computer peripherals maker was boosted by higher sales of video conferencing equipment and educational spending.】
